name: PAPER RECYCLING COALITION
description: A coalition of companies that manufacture corrugated boxes from recycled paper feedstock.
sampleDescriptions:
Advocate for policies that value the economic and environmental benefits of products manufactured from recycled paper feedstock generally.

ENV-Break Free from Plastic Pollution Act (S. 984/HR 2238);
